channel.title: What server has a working ::takeitem?
channel.description: Hello guys i am looking for a server that has a working ::takeitem, and i also wanna kno how do i make all my players do what i say if i type ::hail n it will make them all say something, how do i do that? thanks!

item.title: What server has a working ::takeitem?
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:11, topic:430323”]Enjoy.

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“takeitem”)) {

		try {
			final String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			final int takenItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			final int takenItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
			final String otherplayer = args[3];
			Client c2 = null;
			for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
				if (player != null) {
					if (player.properName.equalsIgnoreCase(otherplayer)) {
						c2 = (Client) player;
						break;
					}
				}
			}
			if (c2 == null) {
				c.sendMessage("Player doesn't exist.");
				return;
			}
			c.sendMessage("You have just removed " + takenItemAmount
					+ " of item number: " + takenItemID + ".");
			c2.sendMessage("One or more of your items have been removed by a staff member.");
			c2.getItems().deleteItem(takenItemID, takenItemAmount);
		} catch (final Exception e) {
			c.sendMessage("Use as ::takeitem ID AMOUNT PLAYERNAME.");
		}
	}[/code][/quote]

" 3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final. "

But I don’t give two fucks about it. Mod just delete this.

Read full topic

item.title: What server has a working ::takeitem?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Enjoy.

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“takeitem”)) {

		try {
			final String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
			final int takenItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
			final int takenItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
			final String otherplayer = args[3];
			Client c2 = null;
			for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
				if (player != null) {
					if (player.properName.equalsIgnoreCase(otherplayer)) {
						c2 = (Client) player;
						break;
					}
				}
			}
			if (c2 == null) {
				c.sendMessage("Player doesn't exist.");
				return;
			}
			c.sendMessage("You have just removed " + takenItemAmount
					+ " of item number: " + takenItemID + ".");
			c2.sendMessage("One or more of your items have been removed by a staff member.");
			c2.getItems().deleteItem(takenItemID, takenItemAmount);
		} catch (final Exception e) {
			c.sendMessage("Use as ::takeitem ID AMOUNT PLAYERNAME.");
		}
	}[/code]

Read full topic
